amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize the use of block grant funds to enhance health care clinic security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 13 in the congressional Record of February 10, 1995) to permit the use of block grant funds for enhancing health care clinic security against violence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schroeder amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 266 (Roll no. 125).
